metadata.title: CVE-2014-2528 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: kcleanup.cpp in KDirStat 2.7.3 does not properly quote strings whendeleting a directory, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrarycommands via a ' (single quote) character in the directory name, adifferent vulnerability than CVE-2014-2527.

criterions.comment: k4dirstat: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
